trans-unit.source: Provides the base implementation for all controls that contain single content and have a header.
trans-unit.target: 提供的所有控件都包含单个内容，并且有一个标头的基实现。

trans-unit.source: HeaderedContentControl inherits the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> property from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> and defines the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A> property that is of type <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: HeaderedContentControl 继承<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>来自<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>定义该<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A>类型<xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object>的属性</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A>和</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>属性</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A> provides a heading for the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A>提供控件的标题。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A>

trans-unit.source: Like the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A> can be any type.
trans-unit.target: 如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A>可以是任何类型。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows two <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> objects, which inherit from HeaderedContentControl.
trans-unit.target: 下图显示了两个<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>从 HeaderedContentControl 继承的对象。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>

trans-unit.source: The first <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> has <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> objects as the content in both the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>: the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A> is set to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> that contains an <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Ellipse> and a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>; the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> is set to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> and a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>.
trans-unit.target: 第一个<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>具有<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>对象中的内容作为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>︰<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A>设置为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>，其中包含<xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Ellipse>并且<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>;<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>设置为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>包含的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>和一种<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> </xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Ellipse> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A> of the second <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> is set to a string and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> is set to a single <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A>的第二个<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>设置为字符串，并<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>设置为单个<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A>

trans-unit.source: ![TabControl](~/add/media/controlcontentmodelteabitem.PNG "TabControl") TabControl with different types in the Header property A HeaderedContentControl has a limited default style.
trans-unit.target: ![TabControl](~/add/media/controlcontentmodelteabitem.PNG "TabControl")与标头属性 HeaderedContentControl 中不同类型的 TabControl 具有有限的默认样式。

trans-unit.source: An application developer can create a HeaderedContentControl, but its appearance will be very simple.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序开发人员可以创建 HeaderedContentControl，但其外观将非常简单。

trans-unit.source: If you wish to enhance the appearance of the control, you can create a new <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要提高控件的外观，则可以创建新的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: A HeaderedContentControl is useful for creating custom controls because it provides a model for single content controls with headers.
trans-unit.target: HeaderedContentControl 可用于创建自定义控件，因为它提供用于使用标头的单个内容控件的模型。

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: 对于此控件的依赖项属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: 如果属性设置的默认样式，该属性可能会更改从其默认值，如果控件出现在应用程序中。

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: 桌面主题用应用程序运行时确定的默认样式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认 WPF 主题](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the header is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示此标头是否<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header*> property is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header*>属性不是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header*>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.HasHeader*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.HasHeader*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.HasHeader*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data used for the header of each control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置使用的标头的每个控件的数据。

trans-unit.source: Like the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, the Header can be any type.
trans-unit.target: 如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>，标头可以是任何类型。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl> uses the same logic to display the Header that is described in <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl>使用相同的逻辑，以显示述<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A?displayProperty=fullName>的标头</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: A header object.
trans-unit.target: 标头对象。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header*> dependency property.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a composite string that specifies how to format the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header*> property if it is displayed as a string.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个复合字符串，指定如何格式化<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header*>属性，如果它显示为一个字符串。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header*>

trans-unit.source: HeaderStringFormat can be a predefined, composite, or custom string format.
trans-unit.target: HeaderStringFormat 可以是预定义、 撰写的或自定义字符串格式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about string formats, see [Formatting Types](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关字符串格式的详细信息，请参阅[格式化类型](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.HeaderTemplate%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.HeaderTemplateSelector%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl>, the HeaderStringFormat property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.HeaderTemplate%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.HeaderTemplateSelector%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl>，HeaderStringFormat 属性将被忽略。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.HeaderTemplateSelector%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.HeaderTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.target: 一个复合字符串，指定如何格式化<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header*>属性，如果它显示为一个字符串。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header*>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template used to display the content of the control's header.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于显示控件的标头的内容的模板。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Property Element Usage ## XAML Values *ResourceExtension* One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 属性用法``` ``` # # XAML 属性元素用法 # # XAML 值*ResourceExtension*以下项之一︰ `StaticResource`，或`DynamicResource`。

trans-unit.source: See [XAML Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[XAML 资源](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: *TemplateResourceKey* The key that identifies the template being requested.
trans-unit.target: *TemplateResourceKey*标识所请求的模板的键。

trans-unit.source: The key refers to an existing resource in a <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: 键指一种<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>。</xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>中的现有资源

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Property element syntax is technically possible, but not recommended.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 属性元素语法是从技术上讲是可行的但不是建议这样做。

trans-unit.source: See [Inline Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[内联样式和模板](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: A binding reference using or is also possible, but uncommon.
trans-unit.target: 绑定引用使用，或也是可行的但不常见。

trans-unit.target: 数据模板。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.HeaderTemplate*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.HeaderTemplate*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.HeaderTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a data template selector that provides custom logic for choosing the template used to display the header.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个数据模板选择器，它提供用于选择用来显示标头的模板的自定义逻辑。

trans-unit.source: If both the HeaderTemplateSelector and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.HeaderTemplate%2A> properties are set, the template selector property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果这两个 HeaderTemplateSelector 和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.HeaderTemplate%2A>属性被设置，将忽略模板选择器属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.HeaderTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *MyDataTemplateSelectorImplementation* A class derived from that implements a practical override.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 属性用法``` ``` # # XAML 属性元素用法``` ``` # # XAML 值*MyDataTemplateSelectorImplementation*从派生的类实现实用的重写。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to map your custom class, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何映射自定义类的信息，请参阅[XAML 命名空间和 Namespace 映射为 WPF XAML](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: *ResourceExtension* One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`.
trans-unit.target: *ResourceExtension*以下项之一︰ `StaticResource`，或`DynamicResource`。

trans-unit.source: See [XAML Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[XAML 资源](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: *DataTemplateSelectorClassKey* The key that identifies the selector implementation being requested.
trans-unit.target: *DataTemplateSelectorClassKey*标识所请求的选择器实现的键。

trans-unit.source: The key refers to a derived class that implements a practical <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A> override.
trans-unit.target: 键指实现实用的派生类<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A>重写。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information about how to map your custom class, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](../Topic/XAML%20Namespaces%20and%20Namespace%20Mapping%20for%20WPF%20XAML.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何映射自定义类的信息，请参阅[XAML 命名空间和 Namespace 映射为 WPF XAML](../Topic/XAML%20Namespaces%20and%20Namespace%20Mapping%20for%20WPF%20XAML.md)。

trans-unit.source: You can also programmatically add an instance of your <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector> class as a resource to a resource dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 你可以以编程方式添加的实例你<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>类作为资源的资源字典。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>

trans-unit.target: 提供的字符串表示形式<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A string representation of the object.
trans-unit.target: 对象的字符串表示形式。
